The '''small End islands''' biome is a biome used to generate [[Terrain features#Outer islands|outer End islands]].

== Description ==
This biome generates as part of the outer islands of [[the End]] which consists of the empty expanses between the larger islands, populated only by smaller, circle-shaped islands. Neither [[End cities]] nor [[chorus tree]]s can generate in this biome and it is the only biome where [[small island]]s can generate.

{{HistoryTable
